Accordion

Example:

Anim pariatur cliche reprehenderit, enim eiusmod high life accusamus terry richardson ad squid. 3 wolf moon officia aute, non cupidatat skateboard dolor brunch. Food truck quinoa nesciunt laborum eiusmod. Brunch 3 wolf moon tempor, sunt aliqua put a bird on it squid single-origin coffee nulla assumenda shoreditch et. Nihil anim keffiyeh helvetica, craft beer labore wes anderson cred nesciunt sapiente ea proident. Ad vegan excepteur butcher vice lomo. Leggings occaecat craft beer farm-to-table, raw denim aesthetic synth nesciunt you probably haven't heard of them accusamus labore sustainable VHS.

Accordion Side Menu

Accordion side menu is a vertical navigation component which apart from traditional, text links, might embed icons, dropdowns, images or even forms. For more information and examples visit side menu navigation page.

Example:

Link with sub-nav 1
Sub navigation link 1 Sub navigation link 2 Sub navigation link 3 Sub navigation link 4 Sub navigation link 5
Link with sub-nav 2
  • Sub-navigation list link 1
  • Sub-navigation list link 2
  • Sub-navigation list link 3
Regular link
Link with sub-nav 3
We'll never share your email with anyone else.
Regular link 2

Accordion List

Accordion lists are commonly used for things like FAQ's where the title exposes the description in an expanding menu fashion. Accordion List uses HTML5 roles, some ARIA properties, and IDs for accessibility.

Example:

  1. Consectetur Fusce Euismod

    Cras justo odio, dapibus ac facilisis in, egestas eget quam. Vestibulum id ligula porta felis euismod semper. Link.

  2. Pellentesque Justo Nibh Inceptos

    Cras justo odio, dapibus ac facilisis in, egestas eget quam. Vestibulum id ligula porta felis euismod semper.

  3. Nullam Nibh Fermentum Vehicula

    Cras justo odio, dapibus ac facilisis in, egestas eget quam. Vestibulum id ligula porta felis euismod semper.
